title: SolrJ JDBC - Apache Zeppelin JDBC documentation
description: SOLR-8786 demonstrated that the Solr JDBC driver is usable from Apache Zeppelin. It would be great to have this documented like SOLR-8521

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content: Added initial step-by-step guide for Apache Zeppelin to match how SOLR-8521 was done. New screenshots for Solr 6.0.0 instead of SNAPSHOT need to be taken and this should be integrated into the reference guide.

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content: Note that this requires a SNAPSHOT build of Apache Zeppelin 0.6 since JDBC support is in 0.6 only.

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content: Another way to add the SolrJ JDBC driver is to use the Maven artifact org.apache.solr:solr-solrj:6.0.0 when creating the JDBC interpreter. I attached a screenshot of that approach.

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content: Adding images I used for a post on this topic (here and here). Planning to create CWIKI page in the next few days.
